item.title: Unbricking TP-LINK MR3220 V2 using Arduino
item.description: In this post I’ll be explaining how to unbrick tp-link wireless N router. This only works if the boot loader is not damaged. It worked for me and hope it will for you. I’m not responsible for any damaged device and do it at your own risk. Things You Will need Male Berg Connectors Soldering kit Arduino (or any other USB to TTL converter should work) Connecting wires A PC or Mac(I use Windows Here as the the drivers are available easily) Jumper Cables How-To First to get to the board you need to remove the router’s case.
